Cincy ZIP Code Tabulation Areas

Source: R/cincy_geographies.R
cincy_zcta_geo.Rd

Read ZIP Code Tabulation Areas (ZCTAs) geographies from the online Census TIGER/Line files into R

Usage

cincy_zcta_geo(vintage = as.character(2024:2013), packaged = TRUE)

Arguments

vintage

a character vector of a year corresponding to the vintage of TIGER/Line data

packaged

logical; use the data included with the package instead of (down)loading from the source data?

Value

a simple features object with a geographic identifier column (geoid) and a geometry column (s2_geography)

Examples

cincy_zcta_geo("2020")
#> Simple feature collection with 55 features and 1 field
#> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
